title: Strawberry Muffins
ingredients: ['75g (3 oz) porridge oats', '225ml (8 fl oz) buttermilk', '100g (4 oz) plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 egg', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '175g (6 oz) light brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '175g (6 oz) fresh strawberries, hulled and chopped']
